text: Șerbu is a Romanian surname that may refer to: *Gheorghe Vergil Șerbu (born 1949), Romanian politician and member of the European Parliament *Ieronim Șerbu (1911–1972), Romanian prose writer == See also == *Serbu Firearms, American manufacturer of firearms **Serbu Super-Shorty, a compact, stockless, pump-action shotgun chambered in 12-gauge Category:Romanian-language surnames
title: Șerbu
